entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
